title: Does 5G pose a major threat to all biological life? - Quora

response.answer_text: Does 5G pose a major threat to all biological life? 5G’s of acceleration in a rocket is very rigorous for any life to endure. I’m sure microbes and insects wouldn’t mind 5G’s indefinitely but larger creatures like humans suffer at that kind of acceleration and can handle it only briefly. If you meant the radio frequency communication then, “No, heck no, and utterly no.” The only way radio waves are going to hurt you is if you stick your head in a microwave oven, and then it’ll be heating that injures you.
